page.title: 04Industry in Little Harrowden
page.content: Northamptonshire is famous for its boot and shoe industry based on the hides of local cattle and sheep.Today the industry relies on imported hides and skins. It is interesting to find that the only factory in Little Harrowden is a shoe factory.The site on which the factory stands was originally a nissan hut used during the second world war to house Italian prisoners of war. In 1935 the present building was built as a privately owned factory. Today the factory makes men and womans fashion shoes for Clarkes and Tarrys. The factory employs 27 women.There is a method of cutting out the leather called clicking,this is done at their Finedon factory.Little Harrowden is where the closing is done. The women using sewing machines stitch the pieces of leather together.
